page.title: About Us
page.subtitle: Authentic North Shore Roast Beef & Pizza Since 1987

sections.title: Our Story
content: For over 40 years, our homemade pizza dough has been serving authentic, best pizzas to the Greater Boston North Shore, and now we have been in NH for 8 wonderful years. What started as a small family-owned Roast Beef & pizzeria in Medford has grown into the most beloved pizza and Roast Beef destination.
Our people, our customers, and the communities made us who we are today.
Today, we continue a legacy using the same traditional techniques, fresh ingredients, and the simple approach that made us famous. Every pizza is hand-stretched and made to order with love.

sections.title: Our Mission
content: To serve the most authentic Italian pizzas using traditional recipes, fresh ingredients, and time-honored cooking methods.
We believe that great food brings people together, and every pizza we make is crafted to create memorable moments for our customers and their families.

items.title: Wood-Fired Tradition
items.description: Our brick ovens reach 900Â°F, creating the perfect crispy crust with a tender, airy interior.

items.title: Fresh Daily Ingredients
items.description: We make our dough fresh every morning and use only the finest San Marzano tomatoes and fresh mozzarella.

items.title: Family Recipes
items.description: Every sauce, seasoning blend, and specialty pizza follows recipes passed down through four generations.

items.title: Local Community
items.description: We've been proud to serve the Boston community for decades, supporting local events and charities.
